website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed combination U lock, but it may be too small for some users' needs.
pros: Dust cover included to extend cylinder life
Easy to set and change the combination
Hide numbers when not in use
cons: This lock is on the smaller side, so it's not the right choice if you need a larger lock

customer_reviews.title: Want your bike Stolen? This is the lock for you!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you would like someone to steal your bikes this is the perfect lock for you! Do yourself a favor and buy a better lock and don't make the same mistake as we did.
customer_reviews.author: ibuylotsofthings

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but can be inconvenient to find place to secure bike since it's not that long Follow-up to previous comment: had an incident in which someone tried to steal our bikes; from the marks on the U, it appeared that they used a power tool to try sawing through it; they only managed to wear off about 1/16" before giving up; so the lock saved both our bikes and therefore upping my review to 5 stars; my earlier comment refers to a minor inconvenience given the quality of the lock in doing what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: The bike lock so far has been awesome! I love on campus and the build quality ...
customer_reviews.text: The bike lock so far has been awesome! I love on campus and the build quality is just perfect for my situation. The bike I own is quite expensive and would hate to get it stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Le

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my storage unit that is made of chain ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my storage unit that is made of chain link fence. It easily secures the door to the body of the cage. Since it is a combination lock there is no key to lose or keep track of.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Spillers

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect solution and is durable
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how many bike locks I've had to throw out because of lost keys. This is the perfect solution and is durable. High quality lock.
customer_reviews.author: :D

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, BOTH broke within one month.
customer_reviews.text: After one month, my bike lock brock and the hatch broke off. I figured it might be a defect so I went to buy another one, this time the numbers seized up and couldn't turn anymore AFTER TWO DAYS. this product has terrible quality control, don't buy it if you want your bike to stay safe.
customer_reviews.author: student_ice

customer_reviews.title: Easy, secure, simple.
customer_reviews.text: My husband actually bought this through my account, but I've ordered one again for myself because my ten year old lock just fell apart and I need a new one. It's sturdy and the instructions for setting your own code are easy. I decided to get one of my own after I kept meeting my husband for lunch and he'd get out his Amazer lock and pop it right onto the bike, while I'd get out my key-based u-lock and fumble around for another couple of minutes getting my key out, getting the key into awkward positions, etc. He just pops his lock on, spins the code, and he's off. Great concept well-executed.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I looked at some of the more expensive name brand type locks, but settled on this one because some of the reviews of those higher priced ones scared me off of them. I have been really pleased with this lock. It seems to be durable, is easy to operate (you can program your own custom code, which is nice) and seems to be well constructed. As a couple of other reviews noted, it is pretty heavy, but I use it when I'm commuting to work with my rack and panniers, so I'm not really concerned about weight in that situation, so it's not really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Lock was easily broken and bike stolen
customer_reviews.text: My brand new bike was stolen while it was locked up outside my house to a secure iron railing. Nothing else around the railing or area was damaged and I was home at the time so the thief was able to break through the lock easily and without making much noise. This lock is not secure and cost me a brand new bike. I found the remnants of the lock on my front steps. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: viviane

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE.
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE. Literally the worst bike lock I've ever purchased. Worked five times before the lock decided to reset it's self leaving my bike trapped on a bike rack. My bike even got impounded for being out there too long! Customer service offered to order a replacement.. but why would I want a replacement when I don't even have a bike at the moment to ride? I received a full refund but recommend buying a more expensive bike lock with a key, or a bike lock from Wal-Mart instead.
customer_reviews.author: chi

customer_reviews.title: Went from not great to wretched
customer_reviews.text: I used this lock to lock up my bike for about a year. It was exposed to the elements and whatever, but I didn’t expect the dramatic failure it had today. While mounted on my bike it fell apart. The tumblers went into the street, the whole innards of it went rolling across the pavement. I don’t think anyone should trust this lock with much of anything. Definitely not worth almost the price of a much better lock. UPDATE: Customer Service reached out and refunded my original payment. I still consider this an unwise buy unless they change something about the construction.
customer_reviews.author: ror

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and works very well in this unusual application
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to lock the French doors to my office. It is very sturdy and works very well in this unusual application.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in OH

customer_reviews.title: good lock, see comments for specifics
customer_reviews.text: this lock has been very effective for me. i’m sure if someone was very deviant and understood how this lock could be reset it could mess you up, but I had no issues for months living in the middle of dc short term. long term, especially if your bike is stored outside within public reach, I probably would have gone with something less hackable. but riding to and fro in town it gets the job done. I easily rode with it hooked onto the front of my bike frame while in motion, didn’t need an alternate way to carry it around with me. loved not needing a key.
customer_reviews.author: hannah westphall

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike Lock - Can securely lock 2 bikes to a rack at once!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike lock. I use this for my ebikes. I can get this around two of the frames and a bike rack to lock them to the rack. Takes the worry away from someone with boltcutters being able to cut the cable easily. I still run another combination cable through each of the tires as well, and lock up the batteries. I love the combination lock on this, and the fact that it can pulled off completely for an easy lockup... no need to swivel anything into place or jam pieces into the U-lock... Well worth the money for the peace of mind. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Jon D Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Jams easily, easy to break apart if necessary
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I was first disappointed because the bar isn’t long enough to go around some bike racks. The lock began jamming just several weeks into using it. I used it successfully for 3 months with the lock mechanism jamming more and more often. I was stuck in the rain several times screaming and pulling at it. Today it jammed for good. I spent nearly 15 minutes trying to undo the lock before giving up and rocking my bike back and forth aggressively. Guess what? The lock completely busted open after a few strong shakes. Not reliable, definitely not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great lock semi-ruined by one stupid design choice
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a 5 star lock. However there is one thing that is just mind-numbingly, two star-subtractingly, dumb about it. The slide button that opens up the panel where the combination is slopes up instead of having a hard ridge. Basically, instead of a step you're pushing against, it's a ramp. I live someplace rainy and it is virtually impossible to slide the button when it is wet because you need friction since there is nothing to push against. For the life of me I can't imagine why anyone would design it like this.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much better then dealing with keys
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much better then dealing with keys. Can not believe how well designed it is, very solid . everything, the setup to combination is really good, the numbers are nice and solid nothing is loose and I like how there hidden. I think I should buy another one before the price goes up!
customer_reviews.author: gary russell gerber

customer_reviews.title: Lock button broke after a month. Totally ignored by customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a month and the lock button broke. It sticks and it is incredibly hard to open it with the correct combination. It makes the lock unusable especially since I'm now worried that it would get permanently stuck. Avoid is poorly crafted lock and get something reliable. Update: I've messaged the seller and they have ignored me. And amazon wasn't helpful either. Don't even think about buying this item or anything from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: The lock combo is changed, I'm trying to crack the new code
customer_reviews.text: Hi, the lock works perfectly well, maybe too well. I set my code today and used it. However, when I came back the button wasn't at B, it was at A and I wasn't able to get through the code. The good thing is that after noticing the difference, I didn't put the lock back together. My problem is that the code is now changed and I don't know the code that was on it. I'm trying to reset it and make a new one, but the button won't budge. I'm not sure what to do next.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: I Read Some Bad Reviews
customer_reviews.text: For the negative reviews about how the lock was no longer able to work and it was either a long term nightmare to get removed, I'm sorry for the headache. I really am, but I am glad to know it's a nightmare to remove, considering how one review said just pry off the plastic from where the numbers are. That concerned me. Still, it seems like it would be more time consuming or a pain, so, in that respect, I'm glad I got it. I am concerned if it does jam up on me, on what to do. Hmmmm....
customer_reviews.author: Stickler for Great Products and Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: For a cheaper protection option, this thing is pretty impressive. It's very heavy, and has a fairly resilient mechanism. For about a year, I biked 5 miles to and from work every day, and this lock ate a lot of rain and dirt - was even frozen once or twice. The door mechanism did get a bit stiff over time, but the locking component won't be failing any time soon. As far as theft goes, well, nobody has felt brave enough to try yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Moyers

customer_reviews.title: Small, limited utility
customer_reviews.text: You can secure your frame OR wheel to a post using this U Lock, but you won't get it around your frame, wheel, and post. I do wish I had paid closer attention to the dimensions before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Chachi69

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but theft risk.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today. Using as a bike lock. Very happy with the quality and functions but I’m extremely disappointed in how easy it is for a potential thief to reset the combination and open the lock. I need this for work in the morning and I’m already concerned it’s going to get stolen. Easily a five star item especially at this price point and I would pay double for the same design with a longer neck but not worth anything if someone with basic knowledge resets the combo in 3 seconds and steals your stuff.
customer_reviews.author: rebbyjm64

customer_reviews.title: Lock release button malfunctioned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike lock for my son as he was heading to UCSB the bike theft capital of the world. It worked great for most of the year until the lock release button jammed. He can’t open the lock now. The good news was that the bike wasn’t locked up when this happened. The bad news is the lock s still connected to the bike and we can't get the lock off the frame of the bike. After reviewing this product, the company reached out to me and said they will send another lock out free of charge. That is pretty cool. So, I am changing my review to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rea

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother unless you don't value your bike
customer_reviews.text: Well it's a lock and I guess it was a deterrent at best. Don't bother with this lock unless you want your bike stolen by any ordinary thief with simple tools. Bike was stolen last night and now I'm out $500 and can't get around. If you actually care about your bike and want to protect it, pay the higher price and go with a Kryptonite and their theft warranty up to $2500. You can buy one here: amazon.com/Kryptonite-New-U-Fahgettaboudit-Heavy-Bicycle/dp/B06XCMWW9H/ref=sxin_5_osp155-e0a712f2_cov?ascsubtag=amzn1.osa.e0a712f2-5ade-48ad-9fe6-6dd4467b17d9.ATVPDKIKX0DER.en_US&creativeASIN=B06XCMWW9H&cv_ct_cx=kryptonite+bike+lock&cv_ct_id=amzn1.osa.e0a712f2-5ade-48ad-9fe6-6dd4467b17d9.ATVPDKIKX0DER.en_US&cv_ct_pg=search&cv_ct_wn=osp-search&dchild=1&keywords=kryptonite+bike+lock&linkCode=oas&pd_rd_i=B06XCMWW9H&pd_rd_r=d1c88d67-5f85-406c-903f-49fe103acf3d&pd_rd_w=Rm7nl&pd_rd_wg=eJutj&pf_rd_p=ff28ffeb-0bd3-46bd-a00c-4c3cc2d00812&pf_rd_r=E0WP8TGQSXET6EQR4RS0&qid=1589066449&sr=1-1-32a32192-7547-4d9b-b4f8-fe31bfe05040&tag=ezvid-wiki-reviews-20
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jammed after used 10 times.  Contacted company and no response.
customer_reviews.text: Used the locks for our bikes. We have two bikes. Used a couple times in a couple years and then took them with us to Key West. Used locks about ten times there, then one of them jammed fortunately when it was off the bike. Afraid to use the other one because if it jams with bike locked somewhere you are out of luck. Especially 1900 miles away from home. Contacted company with no response. Going to Amazon next.
customer_reviews.author: MEV

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product - do not buy period
customer_reviews.text: Locked - unable to open. It's obviously defective. I had to take a hammer to it to get it open because the lock wouldn't unlock -- and then just a couple blows and it fell into pieces. Really a good example of what happens when there isn't adequate oversight on the design & build of something like this. Great idea -- horrible execution.
customer_reviews.author: B. Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set combination, feels sturdy, only 4 digit PIN
customer_reviews.text: I received this lock and am using it on my bike in a garage in combination with keyed chain locks. The lock feels strong and it was easy to set the combination. As the description says, it's only a 4 digit PIN so don't expect this lock to hold up to a sustained attack. There's only 9999 combinations possible even if you avoid the obvious ones like 1111 or 1234, so someone with an hour on their hands to mess with it could unlock it. Use accordingly either in combination with other locks or in a place where you feel like someone wouldn't dare mess with it for that long.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, haven't had it long
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, haven't had it long. Seems durable, easy to operate. I really like the convenience of being able to lock my bike without carrying a key. I mostly use it at my office's parking garage, where it remains 24/7, I don't carry it around. Based on some of the reviews mentioning that they accidentally changed the combination, I wrapped a few layers of electrical tape around the port that's used to change the combination once I set it to a new combo. I'm hoping that it never changes again.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Radi

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, clever,  and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Only gripe at all is that it would be nice if it were available in a version 2 inches longer to reach around my Mtn bike front tire so as not to need cable also. This is very quick in terms of locking and unlocking. I have a rack bag on the back of the bike, so when not in use, lock sits perfectly along the inside base of the the rack bag and actually serves to stabilize the bag. Yes its a little heavy, but it definitely will intimidate most would-be thieves. Code is easy to set, and this is great because I hate carrying around extra keys.
customer_reviews.author: kevin dawson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and (appears to be) sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and (appears to be) sturdy. Why three stars? It does not come with a mount. That is a big problem for many bikers. I encourage fellow bikers to take a look at Titanker U Lock instead, which comes with a mount. They are almost identical (I am pretty sure these two came from the same factory with different brand seals). Their prices are almost same.
customer_reviews.author: Bike lover

customer_reviews.title: Not Heavy Duty at all
customer_reviews.text: The title for this product is deceiving. It is actually very lightweight and not heavy duty at all like some of the other name brand bicycle locks you can buy on the market. The plastic near the bottom actually makes it feel quite cheap. But if you want a lock for the sake of just looking like it is locked up, this will do. Would not rely on this if leaving a nicer bike or untended for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chu

customer_reviews.title: Combination feature is far superior to using a key
customer_reviews.text: Nice to find a U Lock that doesn't use a key--this product features a four-digit combination--as the keys are so easily lost, leaving your bike locked up, unusable. In the ~2 months since I started using this lock, no one has visibly attempted to steal my bike, nor has it been stolen, so it's doing a great job!!
customer_reviews.author: AM1998

customer_reviews.title: PLASTIC LOCK. DO NOT TRUST.
customer_reviews.text: maybe bike thieves in my uni are just really smart. they took apart the bottom part of the lock, very easily. they tried to cut the steel part, which held up its part of the end. but the part with the combination was the weak point, and inherently just as important. it's made of plastic and can be wiggled with the right tool. I feel dumb for trusting this lock. don't be like me.
customer_reviews.author: boopboop

customer_reviews.title: Keyless is better.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this lock for more than a week, which I think is a fair amount of time to evaluate it. The sale, direct from Amazer, was exemplary: attractive price; free shipping; prompt order confirmation and shipping notification emails; two day delivery. The instructions were clear, so setting the combination was easy. The lock seems to be well designed and constructed, and functions smoothly. My only complaint is that it does not come with a bicycle mounting bracket, but, since I was aware of that fact prior to purchase, it would be unfair of me to let it influence my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Bret A. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Good deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: This lock is a good deterrent from getting your bike stolen. However, the plastic components and codes offer very little protection and will break from getting hammered. My pure fix urban coaster was stolen when I had this lock. It’s a good price, but if you want to really protect your belongings I will spend a little bit more money for a more quality lock.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin V.

customer_reviews.title: Lock resets
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews, the lock reset after several uses. The combination was my birthday, so forgetting the combo was not the issue. Had to cut it off.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Lock JAMMED.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lock for almost 5 months now and really liked it at first, but the last time I used the lock it jammed. After many attempts to unlock it including trying to reset the combo, I ended up taking a huge pair of bolt cutters to it. You're definitely taking a risk in buying this lock. UPDATE- after posting my review, Amazer reached out to me and has replaced the lock and gave me the offer of replacing it with a different style of theirs. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Honts

customer_reviews.title: 6 months and broke
customer_reviews.text: We have used very lightly like 3 times a month for 6 months and they do not work anymore! One will not lock anymore and the other will not unlock. Very cheaply made product. Also can not return since its been too long.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Overall Pretty good but...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product For A Place With low Crime How Ever if you are Living In The city or hight crime areas I Don't recommend it because the locking mechanism is made of cast zinc with a low melting temperature so you can open this with a lighter if you hold the lighter on long enough but it is a really great bike lock other than that it is really great and had definitely exceeded my expectations For the Price
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Bike Lock Froze
customer_reviews.text: I am sitting here with Amazon customer service to get help with the bike lock as it froze. The customer service agent told me that this is a common problem so I don't know why it's Amazon's choice. I had it on a gate and last week when I went to open it I just pressed the top button and it opened without me putting the code in. I thought I must have done something wrong and this week it happened again. I brought it in to go over the instructions and it froze. I can't move the lever to reset code. To Amazon's credit they are issuing a refund despite being 6 days past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: If only it would open...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the security, ease of use, and reliability of this lock until it decided not to open with the same password I have used for over a year. Even so, I would have given this product a higher rating had it not been for seller's lack of customer service information. Don't write you care about customer satisfaction if you can't provide it.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great lock!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This is my second lock from amazer. The only reason I had to buy a new one is because a failed attempt at stealing my bike, and the potential thieves knocked off the release button. But hey , my was still in it’s spot, safe and sound !! The thieves must’ve tried really hard because they warped the U part of the lock. But this amazing lock didn’t let them take my bike !!!
customer_reviews.author: Potterfan

customer_reviews.title: Great lock to use w/ 15 ft bike cable to lock my Kayak to my roof rack.
customer_reviews.text: We use the bike lock to quickly lock up our kayak when drove from PA to Mo (on our roof rack) and when we left the kayak on the lake to go adventure on land. It worked perfectly. Setting the combo was very easy. The only thing is you must remember to spin the numbers it DOES NOT LOCK AUTOMATICALLY. It made my trip more fun and worry free having a combo lock for my Kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Irksum Ink

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months likely due to rain.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great at first and I give it a 5 star rating for it's quality at the beginning. However, the combination part broke after 6 months making the lock unusable. I bought another one since maybe it was simply unlucky, and the new one also broke 6 months later. It should be noted that I left my bike locked outside, occasionally exposed to the rain. If you plan on always locking your bike inside or if it never rains in your area then I highly recommend this product. Otherwise, I would recommend going for a standard key lock.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Best U-lock out there
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this lock for about a year. Considering all the different climates and the fact that a combination mechanism has a lot more moving mechanisms than a key-based lock, I was pretty skeptical that this would last. However, you can tell that the lock is extremely well-built and the CS team is on top of any questions or problems you might have. The convenience of carrying around 1 less key on my keychain is worth the cost of this lock alone.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar M.

customer_reviews.title: You gotta have this!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have this on your bike and they can steal it it's only because of what you locked it to because they aren't cutting or picking this lock! It's one of the best locks I have come across! Highly recommend! I would definitely but again but I don't think I will ever need to as this is high quality and is made to last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lock, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Overall: I highly recommend this bike lock, especially if you're forgetful like me, and don't want to risk losing a key. It's very well built, without being excessively heavy so as to be a burden while biking. Downsides: the lock is slightly on the small side relative to other's I've seen. On occasion, be difficult to lock up so that it holds the railing, front tire and bike frame at the same time. However, this is rarely an issue, and in my opinion doesn't detract from the usefulness of the product.
customer_reviews.author: ZK

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough
customer_reviews.text: I am getting a refund and having to return this item. It is not long enough to lock the front wheel and then over the frame on a standard men's bike. It's useless for me. Setting the combination worked well and was simple. I would just double check the measurements for the depth. Was about 1/8" too short for my bike. The company has been good with follow up for me and the refund came quick. I thought about deleting this review, but I figured others might want to see this and to make sure they double check the measurement. I thought it would fit my bike but it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: ... this item for the last week and it is easy to set the combination and to use
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well so far - just started using this item for the last week and it is easy to set the combination and to use. Just big enough to fit around my frame and the bike rack, but not too big as it fits in my bike basket. Definitely a heavy lock as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Operation & Easy to See!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock! I bought two to secure garden gates while the dogs are playing outside. The lock mechanism is very smooth, and the numbers are easy to see. The feature I like the most is the closure over the dials-it really protects from rain. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReader

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Service was excellent, and lock works great. I had this same lock before..just a different brand name and seller, and it's a great product. Unfortunately my old one - probably 4 years old - wouldn't open and I had to cut if off. I love the convenience of a combination and not worrying about a key
customer_reviews.author: floatinghomeguy

customer_reviews.title: Great and user friendly and secure
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for over 7 months now for my first ever bike. So safe to say it has been user friendly. I love the covered feature (for times when I have forgotten to actually mix up my combination for security). If it broke, I would but it again
customer_reviews.author: pokes wokes

customer_reviews.title: ( I really liked this lock but I'm really sad one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This lock is very sturdy and very convenient. The slider to open the dust cover and the button to unlock the U makes the process of securing my bike very quick and easy. It's not too heavy as a medium sized lock but it feels very safe. I love this lock. Originally, my dust cover broke but Amazer was so kind. They responded quickly and sent me a replacement lock. I'm very happy with my purchase as I have been wanting a high quality U lock for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: lanma

customer_reviews.title: Best lock in the market. I took me long to find something as good, convenient, nice, safe and cool as this lock!
customer_reviews.text: Better than any sturdy, heavy, huge and ugly expensive locks in the market. I think this is a GREAT product and they can make it PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.author: Cutie pie

customer_reviews.title: This lock is what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Reset button doesn’t work, can’t move it from A to B to reset...went into support@usamazer.com...went to the chat...told them my problem with the reset button, response was I will send you to the computer tech? Told them I was talking about a bike lock not a computer.....next comment was for a Dollar we will connect you to a trouble shooter.......know it’s only a dollar, but dollars add up! Bad, bad customer service.....won’t buy from Amazer again!!!☹️☹️☹️
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: No mounting hardware
customer_reviews.text: I guess the lock is fine but there is no mounting brackets or hardware included. Maybe not a problem if there's room for a big lock in your bag, or you don't mind hand carrying it while you're riding.
customer_reviews.author: Boatpeople

customer_reviews.title: Too small but works well otherwise
customer_reviews.text: The lock works well, and I love how simple it is. Unfortunately it's just too small. In order to secure my bike frame to the rack (as opposed to just a tire, which isn't very secure), I have to be able to pull my bike up to the end of the rack, which isn't always possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LOCK
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this lock! I have 3 of them and they are the best. Easy to remember your own code and no one thinks to mess with the u-lock. Their customer service is excellent! I bought one for my friend's new bike the other day.
customer_reviews.author: Kasonda Collier

customer_reviews.title: Started breaking down but customer service replaced it!
customer_reviews.text: After using this lock for 5 months, I started noticing the top locking mechanism deteriorating. It was getting hard for my to open my lock and required me to shimmy it a bit for it to open. I was about to dump it and buy a different lock but after bringing this up with Amazer, they kindly offered to send me a new lock to replace this one. Their customer service is very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dang

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm so far
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area that is REALLY prone to bike theft - to the point where I would keep my bike in my apartment and feel compelled to glare at the free bike racks out front when passing by. I got this lock for the back tire and another (different) for the front tire and frame, and my bike has been safely sitting outside for several weeks now! I will update if my bike/tires get stolen.
customer_reviews.author: EspressoFox

customer_reviews.title: Successfully prevented theft!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lock back in May for my bike. Someone attempted to cut the lock last night and failed! Haven’t had issues with jamming until it was tampered with :( hence the 4/5 stars. Great lock, great price but in my case it’ll now need replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Most Secure Lock
customer_reviews.text: This is the most secure bike lock I’ve found. Whatever you do, follow the instructions to the letter when setting up. I made a mistake and could not open it. I went through an ordeal finding someone with the circular saw that would cut through it. I repurposed it and was extremely careful this time!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: instructions super easy to reprogram
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really used it other than to get it ready to go. Seems heavy duty, is pretty hefty in weight. I have panniers so will have them to put it in, but could be a little tricky without that or some other plan, Perhaps I'll discover that myself in time.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The button to unlock is located at the inside so sometimes its uncomfortable to lock your bike if theres not much space. Also, on cold days and lately the lock is very stiff/hard to unlock by pressing the button - making it very tricky to lock-unlock. I would rather invest a little more and get one with key.
customer_reviews.author: Ine

customer_reviews.title: An easy to use basic lock.
customer_reviews.text: I like this lock. I wish it were a bit beefier but overall a nice deterrent. Sure it can be cut through in 30 seconds but it is what it is. Not too heavy. Nice door to access the key numbers. Looks sharp. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Have not had any issues with locking up ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have not had any issues with locking up and not releasing so far. Have used it several times. Setting the combo was easy and it’s a good weight/thickness. It’s not really possible to get the front tire and the frame and I wish the “U” portion of the lock was 3” longer so the bike didn’t have to so close to whatever it is locking up to, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great until it reset on its own
customer_reviews.text: Update: I changed this to a 3 star after their customer service team sent a new lock that used a key. I would highly recommend purchasing that product instead of this combination lock. It has been great so far. Much like all the other reviews mentioning this problem, our lock seems to have reset on its own. We'll now have to spend money to hire a professional to cut it off our bike, which will be more than what we saved buying a cheaper lock. This lock may seem worth it at first but I'd recommend investing in a lock that will work long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Use this thing on the double doors of the fridge ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this thing on the double doors of the fridge, since the four year old developed a habit of nocturnal raiding. No more quart of strawberries with one bite out of each and spread out over the couch! Very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Old Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Kept my scooter secure
customer_reviews.text: I used this to lock my electric scooter to a bike rack. It was a bit iffy here and there, the dial-style code is always painstaking, but more bearable than having to carry a key.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Do not have this lock anymore because of the world we live in, but let's just say that power tools were needed to dismantle it (justice was served) &I will definitely be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Unlock
customer_reviews.text: Used all summer with 0 problems. Next summer will put some wd40 & use more. Never locked up as I was scared from some reviews claiming they had to call locksmiths not being able to retrieve their bikes. Great lock all around 360°.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: A  midget lock?
customer_reviews.text: This lock is way too small to be of much use. You can hardly fit it around the bicycle tire let alone around a locking post. I had previously bought one from another brand so assumed they would be about the same size. This one seems to be made for a 3 year's bicycle - so don't buy it unless that's what you want if for.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Lock was easily cut through and as a result my $1500 bike was stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the size l needed....
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lock with some heft for its size, if your looking for a large lock this isn't but if your in the need for a medium size lock like I was this will fit the bill....
customer_reviews.author: Flex

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend ... Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this lock. It’s extremely easy to use (both setting the combination and unlocking/locking). Recently went on bike & booze tour in our city. Friend of mine bought the ‘popular name brand’ u-lock also sold on Amazon, and she struggled with getting hers locked. The keys were “picky” and needed to be inserted perfectly. Plus she had to tote around a key.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this lock to keep my too-smart-for-his-own-good German shepherd in his kennel. He had figured out how to lift the latch with his nose SMH. If he figures this one out then that's a wrap! I like that you can easily press the little button to release it. I don't really use it to keep anyone out so I can't speak to how well it secures things from potential theft. But it's extremely easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree D. Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This
customer_reviews.text: This product is useless. You can't even switch the metal button from A to B to set the lock. I even brought it to a bike shop for help and they couldn't even move the button even with tools. Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: mmrcela

customer_reviews.title: Speedy Bike Lock that Works!
customer_reviews.text: This bike lock is so easy to use. I can pop it on and off super fast and is made very well. Takes me far less time than my girlfriend with her different bike lock. The number display is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Calum

customer_reviews.title: Lock resets itself
customer_reviews.text: This product reset itself and now the combination is not the same one I had set. I would love some feedback on this! So inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Huppler

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I anticipated. This will not go around ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I anticipated. This will not go around your bike, bike tire, and bike rack. So I usually cannot secure my tire with it. Which makes me nervous that someone will steal my tire one day. I would size up if you want to secure your tire as well.
customer_reviews.author: nilly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good it is definitely better than looking around everywhere for a lost key. I put in my own combination too which is much easier to remember than a preset one.
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use, had to cut it off bike.
customer_reviews.text: This lock worked one time before permanently locking on my son's brand new bike. Reset instructions did not work. He was devastated and we had to buy bolt cutters to cut it off the bike. HORRIBLE product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Based on other comments, I knew the lock was rather small. When it arrived, I was surprised at just how small it actually is. I had some concerns about whether the lock would reach through the front tire, the frame, and the bike rack. As you can see from the picture, it was no problem. However, this likely won't work on a mountain bike or any bike with thicker tires or down tubes. I do love the convenience of having a combination and not having to worry about a key. It was easy to set the combination as well. All in all, I am happy with this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Wylde

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Bike Lock
customer_reviews.text: I use this bike lock at the indoor bike rack at my apartment, and it works great. Pretty easy to set up the code and feels very sturdy and secure. Would definitely recommend for someone looking for a lock in my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R.

customer_reviews.title: Good at first
customer_reviews.text: Over due review. But plenty of time to go back now. It was good at first but then wouldn’t unlock. Had to call Someone to cut it so my son could get his bike. It lasted just past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were longer and wider.
customer_reviews.text: Very short, and not wide at all. Have to go out of my way to find a place where it fits. Seller was extremely nice though, and even refunded part of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, durable, and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lock I've purchased for my bicycle. It is very easy to use, really durable, and I've been using it for nearly 2 years with no problems. I would purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Yunique

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So far so good since I've only had/used this for almost a week. This is a combination lock, and feels very sturdy and secure. It does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: RBuchanan

customer_reviews.title: good for a low end lock
customer_reviews.text: I use this to lock up a storage unit door and it works great. But I would get something hefty if using this for a more expensive bike.
customer_reviews.author: Sia

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, simple to use
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, simple to use. i changed combo code in 10 seconds, works very smooth. Really like the pvc coating over the "U" bar helps protect against scratching bike. seems like a very secure lock for my two bikes. After using for month, this lock is great! easy to use, very secure and a dream not to worry about keys - love it. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy reliable A+
customer_reviews.text: So we bought two of these at once and I don’t regret doing that these are great locks they’re pretty sturdy and they lock in a way that keeps your bike safe
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Solid... took over ten min to cut through.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock in October and it has been awesome, love the combo vs a key lock. The other day it malfunctioned and was stuck at my work. Contacted customer service and they were great, sent me a replacement after answering a few basic questions. I give it five stars not just because of their help but it took me almost 10 min with a sawza to cut it free. I live in Santa Cruz where tweekers steel bikes all the time, bolt cutters won’t work, and the blade took tons of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot garbage
customer_reviews.text: Used this three times, first two were great. The last time it got stuck and I couldn't get the button to press even though the correct combination was entered. I noticed the plastic base was splitting, didn't look like you needed more than a small tool to break the entire lock open. Seems very flimsy and I'm definitely buying another lock that's more solid. Would not recommend buying this lock, especially if you're in a city.
customer_reviews.author: tommy schnabel

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality lock for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy and easy to use. Also fits well attached to the bike frame and is low profile enough to not get in the way while biking. Very happy with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D

customer_reviews.title: Works completely fine, has a nice texture
customer_reviews.text: Works completely fine, has a nice texture. A little small and can not lock both the wheel and the body of the bike at the same time to a bike rack, however no stars taken off since dimensions are indicated correctly in the explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Bensusan

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock
customer_reviews.text: After three months had to cut it open the combination would not work anymore. Update. Customer service is incredible they sent me a new one so fast! And I do love this lock so I am changing my rating to a five. Highly recommend this lock very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Helen H.

customer_reviews.title: Used Successfully To Secure Boat
customer_reviews.text: Have a 16 foot outboard on a trailer which I wanted to secure. Front hitch on the boat trailer trailer swivels on two removable lynch pins. Took out one pin, swung away the front portion of the hitch, inserted this lock and, bingo, the trailer is incapable of being attached to a vehicle to be towed away. Lock couldn't be easier to program and use.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Carr

customer_reviews.title: A combination was already set, so I could not use.  Now corrected!
customer_reviews.text: The default combo was supposed to be 00000. This was not the case, so I cannot use this device. Amazer has replaced the defective lock. The replacement is working out well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Millar

customer_reviews.title: good but doesn't come with any way to attach to bike
customer_reviews.text: something like this should really come with a rubber piece you attach to your bike that holds the lock. now i gotta buy one and hope its the right size? just include one and increase the price by 2$ smh
customer_reviews.author: robb frank

product_meta.title: Amazer Heavy Duty Combination Bike U Lock, 12mm Bike Lock Bicycle Heavy Duty Combination U Lock Bike Lock Anti Theft
feature_bullets: WHY AMAZER U LOCK CAN KEEP YOUR BIKE SAFE? Amazer U lock is made of 12mm hardened performance steel shackle and covered by a 3.85mm PVC coating(Total lock’s thickness is almost 16mm). So it can resist cutting and leverage attacks. The PVC lining on the "U" prevents it from scratching bike paint job.

KEYLESS & EASY TO SET COMBINATION: Choose Amazer U lock, no more lost keys! 4-digit set your own combination convenience allows for thousands of possible combinations. Prevent thieves use universal key to unlock your lock.

DUST COVER: The combination is covered by a dust cover to protects and extends cylinder life. LOCK SIZE: 8.96”(Length) x 5.74”(Width) x 0.624”(Thickness) - PLEASE NOTE: Manual measurement for reference only.

HEAVY DUTY LOCK OFFER YOUR BIKE MORE SAFETY: The lock’s net weight is 1.817 lbs(0.824 kg). The shackle is made of steel, the cylinder is steel and made of solid zinc alloy. Whole lock is covered by quality PC material for good looking and keep your bike from scratching.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
